task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 4°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to estimate the height of the building in front of me, but I cannot see the top, so I will rotate my view upwards to get a better perspective of its full height.
I can now see the top of the building; I will count the floors to estimate the height, assuming a standard height of 3 meters per floor.
